name: Googlify
description:
Googly Eyes for your Desktop!  Controls: [Edit Mode Off]

- Disables googly eye creation

[Edit Mode On]

 - Enables  googly eyes creation 
- Mouse Click to create new Googly Eye. 
- Hold click to increase size of googly eyes
- Double Click Googly Eyes to be remove individual ones.
- Drag Googly Eyes to re-arrange position.

[Rubbish Bin]

- Removes all Googly eyes on Desktop
